snippet: Dr. Isasi-Díaz was a university professor who pushed for more representation for Catholic Hispanic women in the church and advocated for the ordination of women as priests.
abstract: Ada Maria Isasi-Diaz, dissident theologian who spoke for Hispanic women, dies at age 69.
lead_paragraph: Dr. Isasi-Díaz was a university professor who pushed for more representation for Catholic Hispanic women in the church and advocated for the ordination of women as priests.

headline.seo: Ada María Isasi-Díaz, Dissident Catholic Theologian, Dies at 69
headline.main: Ada María Isasi-Díaz, Dissident Catholic Theologian, Dies at 69
